UPDATE_ON.TITLE: Update avaible
UPDATE_ON.CONTENT: Go on the website for download the new version

UPDATE_OFF.TITLE: No update available
UPDATE_OFF.CONTENT: You will be notified when an update will be ready

HOME.PRESS_BTN: Press the alt key while dropping to launch the video

INFORMATION.THE_PROJECT_CONTENT: DragAndWatch is an open source project created by two developers and a designer addicted to series. We wanted a simple and pleasant way to get our subtitles.
